Package estimation.game

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • estimation.game.GameState
  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the main game logic

        public int getDistributeCount()

        Returns:

      • getPossibleBids

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPossibleBids​(boolean isDealer)
        This method returns an Array of the possible bids that a player can make at each instance, if the player is a dealer, there are restrictions to the bids the player can amek.
        Parameters:
        isDealer - boolean is Dealer
        Returns:
        ArrayList, the possible bids for each player.

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMaxScore()

      • setFirstRoundTrickStarter

        public java.lang.String setFirstRoundTrickStarter​(java.lang.String dealerId)
        This method sets the trick starter for the very first round This method is an Overloaded method for each Round's first Trick starter which is the guy beside the dealer
        Parameters:
        dealerId - the id of the dealer
        Returns:
        String, id of the first trick player

      • setNextTrickStarter

        public void setNextTrickStarter​(java.lang.String prevTrickStarter,
                                java.lang.String trickWinnerId)
        This method resets the previous trick starter variable and makes the current trick winner the next trick starter.
        Parameters:
        prevTrickStarter - the id of the previous person who started the trick
        trickWinnerId - the id of the person who won the previous trick

      • getNextPlayer

        Parameters:
        lastPlayerId - the current player
        Returns:
        String, the next player id

        dealerId - current dealer

        Returns:
